titleStmt.title: Bridge Phase 2: Witness fMS, Collation unit C22

body.ab: <milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0051__main__1"/> Cursed, Cursed Creator! Why <lb n="c57-0051__main__2"/> did I <del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e9016__Start"/>lif<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e9016__End"/> live why in that instant <lb n="c57-0051__main__3"/> did I not extinguish the spark of <lb n="c57-0051__main__4"/> existence which you had so wantonly <lb n="c57-0051__main__5"/> bestowed? I know not— Despair had not <lb n="c57-0051__main__6"/> yet taken possession of me <del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e9028__Start"/>it w<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e9028__End"/>I <lb n="c57-0051__main__7"/> was enraged my feelings were those <lb n="c57-0051__main__8"/> of rage & revenge –I <del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e9040__Start"/>w<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e9040__End"/> could with plea<lb n="c57-0051__main__9"/>sure<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e9049__Start"/>of<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e9049__End"/><del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e9053__Start"/>torn<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e9053__End"/> have destroyed the cottage <lb n="c57-0051__main__10"/> and its inhabitants, and glutted my<lb n="c57-0051__main__11"/>self with their shrieks & misery. <del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e9068__Start"/>They<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e9068__End"/><lb n="c57-0051__main__12"/><del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e9072__Start"/>As<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e9072__End"/> When night came on I quitted <lb n="c57-0051__main__13"/> my retreat and wandered to the <lb n="c57-0051__main__14"/> wood.— <del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e9079__Start"/>And now<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e9079__End"/><mdel>n</mdel>No longer restrained <lb n="c57-0051__main__15"/> by the fear of discovery I gave vent <lb n="c57-0051__main__16"/> to my anguish in fearful howlings. <lb n="c57-0051__main__17"/> I was like a wild beast in the toils; <lb n="c57-0051__main__18"/><del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e9101__Start"/>tearing<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e9101__End"/><lb n="c57-0051__left_margin__1"/>destroying the objects that obstructed <lb n="c57-0051__main__19"/> me <del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e9117__Start"/>with<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e9117__End"/><del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e9120__Start"/>fear<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e9120__End"/>and ranging through the <lb n="c57-0051__main__20"/> wood with stag like swiftness.— <lb n="c57-0051__main__21"/> Oh! What a miserable night I passed. <lb n="c57-0051__main__22"/> the cold stars shone in mockery, <lb n="c57-0051__main__23"/> the bare trees waved their branches <lb n="c57-0051__main__24"/> above me and now and then the sweet <lb n="c57-0051__main__25"/> voice of a bird burst forth amidst <lb n="c57-0051__main__26"/> the universal stillness.– All <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>save I were <lb n="c57-0051__main__27"/> at rest or in enjoyment <del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e9158__Start"/>but I.<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e9158__End"/><del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e9161__Start"/>A<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e9161__End"/><del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e9163__Start"/>nd<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e9163__End"/><lb n="c57-0051__main__28"/> I like the arch fiend bore <del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e9171__Start"/>bo<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e9171__End"/> a hell <lb n="c57-0051__main__29"/> within me and, finding <del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e9177__Start"/>th<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e9177__End"/><del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e9179__Start"/>e<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e9179__End"/>my<lb n="c57-0051__main__30"/>self unsympathized with, I <del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e9189__Start"/>wi<del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e9189__End"/> wished <lb n="c57-0051__main__31"/> to tear <mdel>of</mdel><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>up the trees, <del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e9207__Start"/><del loc="c57-0051__main__d1e9207__End"/> spread havock<lb n="c57-0052__main__1"/> and destruction and then have <lb n="c57-0052__main__2"/> sat down & enjoyed the ruin–<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0052__main__3"/> But this was a luxury of <lb n="c57-0052__main__4"/> sensation that could not <del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e9226__Start"/>last<del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e9226__End"/><lb n="c57-0052__main__5"/><lb n="c57-0052__left_margin__1"/>endure I <del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e9240__Start"/>grew<del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e9240__End"/><del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e9243__Start"/>tired<del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e9243__End"/>became fatigued with excess of bodily <lb n="c57-0052__main__6"/> exertion; and sank on the <lb n="c57-0052__main__7"/><del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e9254__Start"/>g<del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e9254__End"/> damp grass in the despondency <lb n="c57-0052__main__8"/> of despair. There was no one <del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e9259__Start"/>in<del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e9259__End"/><lb n="c57-0052__main__9"/> amo<del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e9264__Start"/>u<del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e9264__End"/>ng the myriads of men that <lb n="c57-0052__main__10"/> existed that <del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e9270__Start"/>could<del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e9270__End"/> would pity <lb n="c57-0052__main__11"/> or assist me — and should I feel <lb n="c57-0052__main__12"/> kindness towards my enemies? <lb n="c57-0052__main__13"/> No! from that moment I de<lb n="c57-0052__main__14"/>clared everlasting war against <lb n="c57-0052__main__15"/><lb n="c57-0052__left_margin__1"/>the<mdel>m</mdel><metamark function="insert">^</metamark> species and more than all against <lb n="c57-0052__main__16"/> h<mdel>e</mdel>im who had formed me & sent <lb n="c57-0052__main__17"/> me forth to <del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e9322__Start"/>pain &<del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e9322__End"/>this insupportable misery.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0052__main__18"/> The sun rose – I heard the <lb n="c57-0052__main__19"/> voices of men and knew that it <lb n="c57-0052__main__20"/> was impossible to return to my retreat <lb n="c57-0052__main__21"/><lb n="c57-0052__left_margin__1"/>during that day; accordingly, I hid myself <lb n="c57-0052__main__22"/> in some thick underwood <del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e9348__Start"/>determine<del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e9348__End"/><lb n="c57-0052__main__23"/> determin<mdel>ed</mdel>ing to devote the ensueing <lb n="c57-0052__main__24"/> hours to reflection on my situation— <lb n="c57-0052__main__25"/><lb n="c57-0052__left_margin__1"/> The pleasant sunshine <lb n="c57-0052__left_margin__2"/> and pure air of day <lb n="c57-0052__left_margin__3"/> restored me to some <lb n="c57-0052__left_margin__4"/> degree of tranquillity &When I considered what had passed <lb n="c57-0052__main__26"/> at the cottage I could not help <lb n="c57-0052__main__27"/> believing that I was too hasty in <lb n="c57-0052__main__28"/> my conclusions – <del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e9387__Start"/>Ther<del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e9387__End"/> I had certain<lb n="c57-0052__main__29"/>ly acted imprudently. <del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e9396__Start"/>My con<del loc="c57-0052__main__d1e9396__End"/> It was <lb n="c57-0052__main__30"/> apparent that my conversation <lb n="c57-0052__main__31"/>had softened the father and I was a <lb n="c57-0052__main__32"/> fool <mdel>to</mdel>for having exposed my person to the <lb n="c57-0052__main__33"/> horror of his children. I ought to<lb n="c57-0053__main__1"/> have familia<del loc="c57-0053__main__d1e9435__Start"/>rzi<del loc="c57-0053__main__d1e9435__End"/>rized the old <mdel>L</mdel>De Lacey <lb n="c57-0053__main__2"/> to me and by degrees have discovered <lb n="c57-0053__main__3"/> myself to the rest of the family when <lb n="c57-0053__main__4"/> they should have been prepared for <lb n="c57-0053__main__5"/> my approach – But I did not believe <lb n="c57-0053__main__6"/> my errors irretrievable – and after <lb n="c57-0053__main__7"/> much consideration I resolved to <lb n="c57-0053__main__8"/> return to the cottage — seek the <lb n="c57-0053__main__9"/> old man and by my representa<lb n="c57-0053__main__10"/>tions win him to my party.—<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0053__main__11"/> These thoughts calmed me &<lb n="c57-0053__main__12"/> in the afternoon I sunk into a <lb n="c57-0053__main__13"/> profound sleep– but the fever <lb n="c57-0053__main__14"/> of my blood did not <del loc="c57-0053__main__d1e9486__Start"/>pe<del loc="c57-0053__main__d1e9486__End"/> allow of <lb n="c57-0053__main__15"/> peaceful dreams <del loc="c57-0053__main__d1e9491__Start"/>for ever<del loc="c57-0053__main__d1e9491__End"/> the hor<lb n="c57-0053__main__16"/> ri<mdel>d</mdel>ble scene of the <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>preceeding day <del loc="c57-0053__main__d1e9520__Start"/>before<del loc="c57-0053__main__d1e9520__End"/><del loc="c57-0053__main__d1e9523__Start"/>was<del loc="c57-0053__main__d1e9523__End"/>was for ever<lb n="c57-0053__main__17"/> acting before my eyes – The females <lb n="c57-0053__main__18"/> were flying and the eraged Felix <lb n="c57-0053__main__19"/> tearing me from his fathers feet– I <lb n="c57-0053__main__20"/> awoke exhausted, and finding that <lb n="c57-0053__main__21"/> it was already night I crept from <lb n="c57-0053__main__22"/> my hiding place & went in search <lb n="c57-0053__main__23"/> of food.<lb n="c57-0054__main__1"/><milestone spanTo="#c57-0054.01" unit="tei:head"/>Chapt. 8<lb n="c57-0054__main__2"/> When my hunger was appeased I directed <lb n="c57-0054__main__3"/> my steps towards the well known path <lb n="c57-0054__main__4"/> that conducted to the cottage – All there, <lb n="c57-0054__main__5"/> was at peace – <del loc="c57-0054__main__d1e9564__Start"/>I<del loc="c57-0054__main__d1e9564__End"/> I crept into my hovel <lb n="c57-0054__main__6"/> and remained in silent expectation of <lb n="c57-0054__main__7"/> the accustomed hour when the family <lb n="c57-0054__main__8"/> arose. That hour<del loc="c57-0054__main__d1e9577__Start"/><del loc="c57-0054__main__d1e9577__End"/> past, and the sun mounted <lb n="c57-0054__main__9"/> high in the heavens but the cottagers <lb n="c57-0054__main__10"/> did not appear – I trembled violently, <lb n="c57-0054__main__11"/> apprehending some dreadful misfortune. <lb n="c57-0054__main__12"/> The inside of the cottage was dar<mdel/>k& I <lb n="c57-0054__main__13"/> heard no motion. I cannot describe the <lb n="c57-0054__main__14"/> agony I felt during this suspense.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0054__main__15"/> Presently two countrymen past by <lb n="c57-0054__main__16"/> but pausing near the cottage they enterred <lb n="c57-0054__main__17"/> into conversation using violent gestures <lb n="c57-0054__main__18"/> I did not understand what they said for <lb n="c57-0054__main__19"/><del loc="c57-0054__main__d1e9614__Start"/>they<del loc="c57-0054__main__d1e9614__End"/> their language differred from that <lb n="c57-0054__main__20"/> of my <del loc="c57-0054__main__d1e9619__Start"/>frien<del loc="c57-0054__main__d1e9619__End"/> protectors – Soon After, however, <lb n="c57-0054__main__21"/> Felix approached with another man <lb n="c57-0054__main__22"/> I was surprised as I knew that <del loc="c57-0054__main__d1e9627__Start"/>H<del loc="c57-0054__main__d1e9627__End"/> he <lb n="c57-0054__main__23"/> had not quitted the cottage that morning <lb n="c57-0054__main__24"/> and waited anxiously to discover by <lb n="c57-0054__main__25"/> his discourse the meaning of these <lb n="c57-0054__main__26"/> unusual appearances. "Do you consider, <lb n="c57-0054__main__27"/> "said his companion to him — that you <lb n="c57-0054__main__28"/> "will be obliged to pay three months rent <lb n="c57-0054__main__29"/> "& to lose the produce of your garden. <lb n="c57-0054__main__30"/> "<del loc="c57-0054__main__d1e9647__Start"/>Cons<del loc="c57-0054__main__d1e9647__End"/> I do not with to take any unfair advantage<lb n="c57-0055__main__1"/> and I beg therefore that you will <lb n="c57-0055__main__2"/> take some days to <del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9664__Start"/>consult<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9664__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>consider ofabout <lb n="c57-0055__main__3"/> this affair with your <del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9682__Start"/>friends.<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9682__End"/> determination.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0055__main__4"/> It is utterly useless– replied Felix, <lb n="c57-0055__main__5"/> we <mdel>s</mdel>can never <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>again inhabit that cottage <lb n="c57-0055__main__6"/><del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9709__Start"/>again<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9709__End"/> –The life of <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>my father is in the greatest <lb n="c57-0055__main__7"/> danger owing to the dreadful circumstanc <lb n="c57-0055__main__8"/> that I have related— My wife and sister <lb n="c57-0055__main__9"/><del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9730__Start"/>can<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9730__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>will never recover their horror— <del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9741__Start"/>Do<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9741__End"/> I <lb n="c57-0055__main__10"/> entreat you not to reason with me <lb n="c57-0055__main__11"/> any more—<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9748__Start"/>let<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9748__End"/> Take possession <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>of your tenement and let me <lb n="c57-0055__main__12"/> fly from this place – <del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9764__Start"/>very<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9764__End"/>We intend <lb n="c57-0055__main__13"/> very soon to quit entirely the country.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0055__main__14"/> Felix trembled violently as he said <lb n="c57-0055__main__15"/> this. He and his companion entered the <lb n="c57-0055__main__16"/> cottage <del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9781__Start"/>w<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9781__End"/> in which they remained for a <lb n="c57-0055__main__17"/> few minutes & then departed. I never <lb n="c57-0055__main__18"/> again saw any of the family of de Lacey.<lb n="c57-0055__main__19"/><del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9795__Start"/>They had qu<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9795__End"/>more.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0055__main__20"/>And now my hopes were entirely <lb n="c57-0055__main__21"/> fled –were I had been fool enough to <lb n="c57-0055__main__22"/> hope but these><milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0055__main__23"/> I <del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9818__Start"/>remained<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9818__End"/>continued<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9824__Start"/>all night<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9824__End"/><mdel><metamark function="insert">^</metamark></mdel> in my hovel<metamark function="insert">^</metamark> for the remainder of the day<lb n="c57-0055__main__24"/> in a state of utter & stupid despair– <lb n="c57-0055__main__25"/> my protectors had departed and had <lb n="c57-0055__main__26"/> broken the only link that held me <lb n="c57-0055__main__27"/> to the world– for the first time the <lb n="c57-0055__main__28"/> feeling of revenge and hatred filled <lb n="c57-0055__main__29"/> my bosom, and I did not strive to <lb n="c57-0055__main__30"/> controul them — but allowing myself <lb n="c57-0055__main__31"/> to be borne away by the stream I <lb n="c57-0055__main__32"/> bent my mind<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9863__Start"/>s<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9863__End"/> towards <del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9866__Start"/>I<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9866__End"/> injury & death– <lb n="c57-0055__main__33"/><del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9872__Start"/>But<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9872__End"/> when I thought of my friends– of <lb n="c57-0055__main__34"/> the mild voice of De Lacey the gentle <lb n="c57-0055__main__35"/> eyes of Agatha – and the <del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9879__Start"/>warm<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9879__End"/><del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9882__Start"/>he<del loc="c57-0055__main__d1e9882__End"/><lb n="c57-0056__main__1"/> exquisite beauty of the Arabian — these thoughts <lb n="c57-0056__main__2"/> vanished& a gush of tears somewhat soothed <lb n="c57-0056__main__3"/> me—But again <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>when I reflected that they had <lb n="c57-0056__main__4"/> spurned & deserted me, anger returned <lb n="c57-0056__main__5"/> and unable to <del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e9914__Start"/>hurt<del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e9914__End"/> injure anything <lb n="c57-0056__main__6"/> human I turned my fury towards <lb n="c57-0056__main__7"/> inanimate objects.– As night advanced <lb n="c57-0056__main__8"/> I placed a variety of combustibles around <lb n="c57-0056__main__9"/> the cottage, and after having destroyed <lb n="c57-0056__main__10"/> every vestige of cultivation in the <lb n="c57-0056__main__11"/> garden — <del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e9933__Start"/>when<del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e9933__End"/><del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e9936__Start"/>the sun h<del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e9936__End"/>the <lb n="c57-0056__main__12"/> moon had I waited with forced pa<lb n="c57-0056__main__13"/>tience untill the moon had sunk <lb n="c57-0056__main__14"/><del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e9954__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e9954__End"/> to commence my operations. As <lb n="c57-0056__main__15"/> the night advanced a fierce wind <lb n="c57-0056__main__16"/> arose from the woods and quickly <lb n="c57-0056__main__17"/><del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e9962__Start"/>covered the heavens wit<del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e9962__End"/> dispersed <lb n="c57-0056__main__18"/> the clouds that had loitered in the <lb n="c57-0056__main__19"/> heavens— <milestone spanTo="#c57-0056.03" unit="tei:seg"/>Like a mighty avelanche<lb n="c57-0056__main__20"/><lb n="c57-0056__left_margin__1"/>the blast <del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e9982__Start"/>it<del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e9982__End"/> tore a long <metamark corresp="#c57-0056.03" function="displacement">/</metamark> and <del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e9990__Start"/>filled with<del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e9990__End"/><lb n="c57-0056__main__21"/> produced <milestone spanTo="#c57-0056.04" unit="tei:seg"/>in my spirits a kind <lb n="c57-0056__main__22"/> of insanity <metamark corresp="#c57-0056.04" function="displacement">/</metamark> that burst all bounds <lb n="c57-0056__main__23"/> of reason or reflection — I lighted <lb n="c57-0056__main__24"/> a dry branch of tree and danced <lb n="c57-0056__main__25"/> with <del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e10013__Start"/>wild<del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e10013__End"/> fury around the devoted <lb n="c57-0056__main__26"/> cottage, my eyes still fixed on the <lb n="c57-0056__main__27"/> western horizon, <del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e10021__Start"/>towards<del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e10021__End"/> the edge <lb n="c57-0056__main__28"/> of which the moon nearly touched.<lb n="c57-0056__main__29"/> part of it orb was <del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e10031__Start"/>h<del loc="c57-0056__main__d1e10031__End"/> at length <lb n="c57-0056__main__30"/> hid and I waved my brand — it sunk<lb n="c57-0057__main__1"/> and with a loud scream I fird <lb n="c57-0057__main__2"/> the straw and hay <del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e10046__Start"/>of my bon<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e10046__End"/> that <lb n="c57-0057__main__3"/> I had collected. The wind <del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e10053__Start"/>blew<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e10053__End"/>fanned the <del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e10063__Start"/>flame<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e10063__End"/>fire<lb n="c57-0057__main__4"/> and the cottage was quickly enveloped <lb n="c57-0057__main__5"/> by the flames which clun<mdel/>g to it <lb n="c57-0057__main__6"/> and <del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e10085__Start"/>liked<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e10085__End"/> licked it with <del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e10089__Start"/>th<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e10089__End"/><del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e10092__Start"/>with<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e10092__End"/><lb n="c57-0057__main__7"/> their forked <del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e10099__Start"/>ton<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e10099__End"/>& destroying tongues, to destroy <lb n="c57-0057__main__8"/> it—. As soon as I was convinced that <lb n="c57-0057__main__9"/> no <del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e10115__Start"/>hu<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e10115__End"/> assistance could save any <lb n="c57-0057__main__10"/> part of the habitation I quitted <lb n="c57-0057__main__11"/> the scene and sought for refuge <lb n="c57-0057__main__12"/> in the wood.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0057__main__13"/> And now <del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e10129__Start"/>it<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e10129__End"/> with the world before <lb n="c57-0057__main__14"/> me w<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>hither should I bend my steps? <lb n="c57-0057__main__15"/> I resolved to fly far from the scene <lb n="c57-0057__main__16"/> of my misfortunes – <del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e10152__Start"/>And<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e10152__End"/>But to me, hated <lb n="c57-0057__main__17"/> and despised, every country <del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e10161__Start"/>And<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e10161__End"/><lb n="c57-0057__main__18"/> must be equally horrible.– At length <lb n="c57-0057__main__19"/> the thought of you crossed my <lb n="c57-0057__main__20"/> mind — I learned from your papers <lb n="c57-0057__main__21"/> that you <del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e10175__Start"/>was I<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e10175__End"/>were my creator & to whom <lb n="c57-0057__main__22"/><del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e10183__Start"/>w<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e10183__End"/> could I apply with more fitness <lb n="c57-0057__main__23"/> than to h<mdel>e</mdel>im who had given <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>me life. <lb n="c57-0057__main__24"/> Among the lessons that Felix had <lb n="c57-0057__main__25"/> bestowed on <del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e10214__Start"/>Maimouna<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e10214__End"/>Safie geography <lb n="c57-0057__main__26"/> had not been ommitted. From <lb n="c57-0057__main__27"/> these I had learned the relative <lb n="c57-0057__main__28"/> situations of the different countries <lb n="c57-0057__main__29"/><lb n="c57-0057__left_margin__1"/>of the earth; You had mentioned Geneva as <lb n="c57-0057__main__30"/> the name of your native town <lb n="c57-0057__main__31"/>& to<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e10243__Start"/>wards<del loc="c57-0057__main__d1e10243__End"/> this place I resolved to <lb n="c57-0057__main__32"/> proceed.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0058__main__1"/> But how was I to direct myself?—<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>I knew that I must travel <lb n="c57-0058__main__2"/><lb n="c57-0058__left_margin__1"/>in a South westerlydirection<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10281__Start"/>I knew<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10281__End"/>to reach my destination but <lb n="c57-0058__main__3"/><del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10285__Start"/>in this<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10285__End"/> the sun was my only guide – I did not <lb n="c57-0058__main__4"/> know the names of the towns I was to pass <lb n="c57-0058__main__5"/> through, nor could I ask information from <lb n="c57-0058__main__6"/> a single human being – But I did not despair <lb n="c57-0058__main__7"/> From you only could I hope for succour <lb n="c57-0058__main__8"/> although towards you I felt <del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10301__Start"/>only<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10301__End"/>no<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10307__Start"/>the<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10307__End"/>senti<lb n="c57-0058__main__9"/> ment<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10317__Start"/>s of<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10317__End"/><del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10322__Start"/>detestatio<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10322__End"/><mdel>n</mdel>that that of hate. – Unfeeling heartless <lb n="c57-0058__main__10"/> creator! You had endowed me with percep<lb n="c57-0058__main__11"/>tions and passions and then cast me <lb n="c57-0058__main__12"/> abroard for the scorn & horror of man<lb n="c57-0058__main__13"/>kind — <del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10349__Start"/>On<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10349__End"/> But on you only had I any <lb n="c57-0058__main__14"/> claim & from you I determined <mdel>to</mdel>to seek that <lb n="c57-0058__main__15"/> justice <del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10366__Start"/>&<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10366__End"/><del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10369__Start"/>for<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10369__End"/> which I <del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10372__Start"/>w<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10372__End"/> vainly attempted <lb n="c57-0058__main__16"/> to gain from <del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10377__Start"/>your fellow creatures.<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10377__End"/><lb n="c57-0058__left_margin__1"/> any other being <lb n="c57-0058__left_margin__2"/> that wore the human <lb n="c57-0058__left_margin__3"/> form. .<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0058__main__17"/> My travels were long and <del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10396__Start"/>the<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10396__End"/> the <lb n="c57-0058__main__18"/><del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10400__Start"/>suff<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10400__End"/> sufferings I endured intense –It was <lb n="c57-0058__main__19"/> late in autumn when I quitted the <lb n="c57-0058__main__20"/> district where I had so long resided – Months <lb n="c57-0058__main__21"/> passed and I knew not how near I I tra<lb n="c57-0058__main__22"/>velled only at night, fearful of meeting <lb n="c57-0058__main__23"/> the visage of a human being.—Nature <lb n="c57-0058__main__24"/> decayed around me and the sun became <lb n="c57-0058__main__25"/><del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10430__Start"/>co<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10430__End"/> heatless,—rain & snow poured around me and I <lb n="c57-0058__main__26"/> found no shelter — Oh Earth how often <lb n="c57-0058__main__27"/> did I imprecate curses on the cause of <lb n="c57-0058__main__28"/> my being— The mildness of <del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10442__Start"/>the<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10442__End"/> my nature <lb n="c57-0058__main__29"/> had fled & all within me was turned to gall <lb n="c57-0058__main__30"/>& bitterness – I hated De Lacey and his family <lb n="c57-0058__main__31"/> and the nearer I approached to your habi<lb n="c57-0058__main__32"/>tation the more deeply did I feel the spirit <lb n="c57-0058__main__33"/> of revenge <del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10470__Start"/>imprint itself on<del loc="c57-0058__main__d1e10470__End"/>become kindled in my heart—<lb n="c57-0059__main__1"/> Snow fell around me and the waters <lb n="c57-0059__main__2"/> were hardened, but I rested not—A few <lb n="c57-0059__main__3"/> incidents now and then directed me <lb n="c57-0059__main__4"/> right but I often <del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10491__Start"/>de<del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10491__End"/> wandered wide from <lb n="c57-0059__main__5"/> my path. <metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c57-0059.01">X</metamark><lb n="c57-0059__left_margin__1"/><metamark function="displacement">X</metamark><lb n="c57-0059__left_margin__2"/> The agony of <lb n="c57-0059__left_margin__3"/> my grief <lb n="c57-0059__left_margin__4"/> allowed me no <lb n="c57-0059__left_margin__5"/> respite, <del loc="c57-0059__left_margin__d1e10516__Start"/>N<del loc="c57-0059__left_margin__d1e10516__End"/><lb n="c57-0059__left_margin__6"/><del loc="c57-0059__left_margin__d1e10520__Start"/>No event of my<del loc="c57-0059__left_margin__d1e10520__End"/><lb n="c57-0059__left_margin__7"/> No incident <lb n="c57-0059__left_margin__8"/> occurred from <lb n="c57-0059__left_margin__9"/> which my rage <lb n="c57-0059__left_margin__10"/>& misery could <lb n="c57-0059__left_margin__11"/> not extract its <lb n="c57-0059__left_margin__12"/> food.<mdel>An</mdel><del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10543__Start"/>incident<del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10543__End"/>but a circumstance that happened <lb n="c57-0059__main__6"/> when I arrived on the confines of Swit<lb n="c57-0059__main__7"/>zerland — when the sun had recovered <lb n="c57-0059__main__8"/> a part of its heat & the earth again <lb n="c57-0059__main__9"/> began to look green confirmed in an<lb n="c57-0059__main__10"/><del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10567__Start"/>dreadful<del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10567__End"/>especial manner the bitterness &<lb n="c57-0059__main__11"/> horror of my feelings.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0059__main__12"/> I generally rested <del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10583__Start"/>through<del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10583__End"/>during the <lb n="c57-0059__main__13"/> day, and travelled only when I was se<lb n="c57-0059__main__14"/>cured by night from the view of man. <lb n="c57-0059__main__15"/><del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10600__Start"/><del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10600__End"/> one morning however finding <lb n="c57-0059__main__16"/> that my path lay through a deep <lb n="c57-0059__main__17"/> wood I ventured to continue my <del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10608__Start"/>way<del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10608__End"/><lb n="c57-0059__main__18"/><lb n="c57-0059__left_margin__1"/>journey after the sun had risenhigh in <lb n="c57-0059__main__19"/> the heavens. The day which was one <lb n="c57-0059__main__20"/> of the first of spring <del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10629__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10629__End"/><del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10632__Start"/>even<del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10632__End"/> cheered <lb n="c57-0059__main__21"/><lb n="c57-0059__left_margin__1"/>even me by the loveliness of its sun<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>shine&<lb n="c57-0059__main__22"/> the gentleness of the breeze. – I felt <del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10656__Start"/>feelings<del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10656__End"/><lb n="c57-0059__main__23"/><lb n="c57-0059__left_margin__1"/>emotions of softness and pleasure that had <lb n="c57-0059__main__24"/> long appeared dead, revive within me; <lb n="c57-0059__main__25"/> half surprized with these new sensa<lb n="c57-0059__main__26"/>tions I allowed myself to be borne <lb n="c57-0059__main__27"/> away by them &<del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10682__Start"/>forg<del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10682__End"/> forgetting my <lb n="c57-0059__main__28"/> solitude & deformity dared to be happy <lb n="c57-0059__main__29"/> tears of gentleness again bedewed my <lb n="c57-0059__main__30"/> cheeks and I <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>even raised my humid eyes <lb n="c57-0059__main__31"/> with thankfullness towards the blessed <lb n="c57-0059__main__32"/> sun which bestowed <del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10706__Start"/>on me<del loc="c57-0059__main__d1e10706__End"/> such joy upon <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>me<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0060__main__1"/> As I continued my way in this mood I <lb n="c57-0060__main__2"/> heard a voices which forced me to conceal my<lb n="c57-0060__main__3"/>self. This I did in a small cave surrounded by <lb n="c57-0060__main__4"/> wood at the foot of which was a <mdel>la</mdel><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>deep & impetuous river – I <lb n="c57-0060__main__5"/> presently discovered that the voices proceeded <lb n="c57-0060__main__6"/> from people who were on the rock which <lb n="c57-0060__main__7"/> formed the roof of the cavern – They spoke a <lb n="c57-0060__main__8"/> language unknown to me – when suddenly <lb n="c57-0060__main__9"/> I heard a noise and saw a <del loc="c57-0060__main__d1e10763__Start"/>woma<del loc="c57-0060__main__d1e10763__End"/> young girl <lb n="c57-0060__main__10"/> fall from the precipiece into the river a <lb n="c57-0060__main__11"/><del loc="c57-0060__main__d1e10769__Start"/>and aloud<del loc="c57-0060__main__d1e10769__End"/> loud scream followed & all was quiet– <lb n="c57-0060__main__12"/> I rushed from my hiding place & dashing into <lb n="c57-0060__main__13"/> the river rescued the girl & bore her to the <lb n="c57-0060__main__14"/> shore. She was senseless & I endeavoured to <lb n="c57-0060__main__15"/> restore her to life when a man came sudden<lb n="c57-0060__main__16"/>ly from the woods and appeared aghas<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0060__main__17"/> I continued to wind among the paths of the <lb n="c57-0060__main__18"/> wood untill I came to its <del loc="c57-0060__main__d1e10795__Start"/>skirts<del loc="c57-0060__main__d1e10795__End"/> boundary which <lb n="c57-0060__main__19"/> was skirted a deep & rapid river — into which <lb n="c57-0060__main__20"/> many of the trees bent their branches now budding <lb n="c57-0060__main__21"/> with the fresh spring.– Here I paused, not exact<lb n="c57-0060__main__22"/>ly knowing what course to pursue when I heard <lb n="c57-0060__main__23"/> voices that induced me to conceal myself under <lb n="c57-0060__main__24"/> the shade of cypress. A rustic approached armed <lb n="c57-0060__main__25"/> with a gun and leading a young girl of about twelve <lb n="c57-0060__main__26"/> years of age When they came near me they turne<lb n="c57-0060__main__27"/> I was scarcely hid when a young girl came run<lb n="c57-0060__main__28"/>ning towards the <del loc="c57-0060__main__d1e10835__Start"/>river<del loc="c57-0060__main__d1e10835__End"/>spot where I was concealed – laughing as if she had ran <lb n="c57-0060__main__29"/> from some one in sport – She continued her <lb n="c57-0060__main__30"/> course along the precipitate sides of the river <lb n="c57-0060__main__31"/> when suddenly her foot slipt, & she fell into<lb n="c57-0060__main__32"/> the rapid <del loc="c57-0060__main__d1e10856__Start"/>current<del loc="c57-0060__main__d1e10856__End"/>stream. I rushed from my hiding <lb n="c57-0060__main__33"/> place and with extreme labour from the <lb n="c57-0060__main__34"/> force of the current saved her, & dragged her <lb n="c57-0060__main__35"/> to shore — She was <del loc="c57-0060__main__d1e10870__Start"/>sensell<del loc="c57-0060__main__d1e10870__End"/> senseless and <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>Iendeavo<lb n="c57-0060__main__36"/>ured by every means in my power to restore<lb n="c57-0061__main__1"/><del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10898__Start"/>her<del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10898__End"/><lb n="c57-0061__left_margin__1"/>animation when I was suddenly interrupted by <lb n="c57-0061__main__2"/> the approach of a rustic who was probably <lb n="c57-0061__main__3"/><del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10912__Start"/>her<del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10912__End"/> the person from whom she had <lb n="c57-0061__main__4"/> playfully fled – On seeing me he darted <lb n="c57-0061__main__5"/> towards me and <del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10922__Start"/>tore<del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10922__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>tearing the girl from <lb n="c57-0061__main__6"/> my arms hastened towards the deeper <lb n="c57-0061__main__7"/> parts of the forest — I know not by <lb n="c57-0061__main__8"/> what I followed speedily I hardly knew <lb n="c57-0061__main__9"/> why but when the man saw me <lb n="c57-0061__main__10"/> draw near he aimed a gun which <lb n="c57-0061__main__11"/> he carried, at my body & fired. I <lb n="c57-0061__main__12"/> sunk to the ground & with encreased <lb n="c57-0061__main__13"/> swiftness He escaped into the wood.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0061__main__14"/> This then was the reward of my <lb n="c57-0061__main__15"/> benevolence I writhed under the <lb n="c57-0061__main__16"/> wound.<del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10968__Start"/>w<del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10968__End"/> had saved a human <lb n="c57-0061__main__17"/> being from destruction and as a <lb n="c57-0061__main__18"/> recompence I now writhed <del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10975__Start"/>un<del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10975__End"/> under <lb n="c57-0061__main__19"/> the miserable pain of <del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10980__Start"/>my wound<del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10980__End"/><del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10983__Start"/>a multitude of<del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10983__End"/><lb n="c57-0061__main__20"/><del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10988__Start"/>wounds.<del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e10988__End"/><lb n="c57-0061__left_margin__1"/> a wound which <lb n="c57-0061__left_margin__2"/> shattered the <lb n="c57-0061__left_margin__3"/> flesh & bone <del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e11003__Start"/>One The ball had grazed my neck<del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e11003__End"/>&the <lb n="c57-0061__main__21"/> an other entered my shoulder. The feelings <lb n="c57-0061__main__22"/> of kindness and <del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e11017__Start"/>softness<del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e11017__End"/>gentleness which I had <lb n="c57-0061__main__23"/> entertained but a few moments before <lb n="c57-0061__main__24"/> gave place to hellish rage & gnashing <lb n="c57-0061__main__25"/> of teeth – inflamed by pain I vowed <lb n="c57-0061__main__26"/> eternal hatred & vengeance to all <lb n="c57-0061__main__27"/> mankind — But <del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e11037__Start"/>pain<del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e11037__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>the agony of my wound overcame me <lb n="c57-0061__main__28"/><del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e11049__Start"/>sens<del loc="c57-0061__main__d1e11049__End"/> my pulses paused and I fainted.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0061__main__29"/> For some weeks I led a miserable <lb n="c57-0061__main__30"/> life in these woods endeavouring to <lb n="c57-0061__main__31"/> cure the wound which I had received. The <lb n="c57-0061__main__32"/> ball had entered my shoulder and I knew <lb n="c57-0061__main__33"/> not whether it had remained there <lb n="c57-0061__main__34"/> or passed through—at any rate I had<lb n="c57-0062__main__1"/> no means of extracting it. <del loc="c57-0062__main__d1e11078__Start"/>A<del loc="c57-0062__main__d1e11078__End"/> My suffering were <lb n="c57-0062__main__2"/> augmented also by the oppressive sense <del loc="c57-0062__main__d1e11083__Start"/>I had<del loc="c57-0062__main__d1e11083__End"/><lb n="c57-0062__main__3"/> of the injustice & ingratitude <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>of their infliction My daily <del loc="c57-0062__main__d1e11104__Start"/>prayers<del loc="c57-0062__main__d1e11104__End"/>vows<lb n="c57-0062__main__4"/> rose for revenge – a deep & deadly revenge <lb n="c57-0062__main__5"/> such as would alone compensate for the <lb n="c57-0062__main__6"/><del loc="c57-0062__main__d1e11119__Start"/>horrors of my situation.<del loc="c57-0062__main__d1e11119__End"/>the outrages & the anguish I had endured.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0062__main__7"/> After some weeks my wound healed <lb n="c57-0062__main__8"/> and I continued my journey — the labours <lb n="c57-0062__main__9"/> I endured were no longer <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>to be alleviated by the <lb n="c57-0062__main__10"/> bright sun or gent<del loc="c57-0062__main__d1e11146__Start"/>t<del loc="c57-0062__main__d1e11146__End"/>le breezes of spring — <lb n="c57-0062__main__11"/> all joy was but a mockery to me, <mdel>&</mdel><lb n="c57-0062__left_margin__1"/> which insul<lb n="c57-0062__left_margin__2"/>ted my desolate <lb n="c57-0062__left_margin__3"/> state, &<lb n="c57-0062__main__12"/> made me feel more painfully that <lb n="c57-0062__main__13"/> I was not made for enjoyment. But <lb n="c57-0062__main__14"/> my <del loc="c57-0062__main__d1e11186__Start"/>journey<del loc="c57-0062__main__d1e11186__End"/>toils now drew near a close & two <lb n="c57-0062__main__15"/> months from this time I reached the <lb n="c57-0062__main__16"/> environs of Geneva.<milestone spanTo="#c57-0062.04" unit="tei:head"/><lb n="c57-0062__main__17"/> The same <lb n="c57-0062__main__18"/> chapter <lb n="c57-0062__main__19"/> continued<lb n="c57-0063__main__1"/><del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e11215__Start"/><milestone spanTo="#c57-0063.01" unit="tei:head"/>Chap. 9th<del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e11215__End"/><lb n="c57-0063__main__2"/><del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e11224__Start"/>I now saw <del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e11224__End"/><del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e11227__Start"/>Thus my journey appeared<del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e11227__End"/><milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0063__main__3"/> It was evening when I arrived in the outskirts <lb n="c57-0063__main__4"/> of <del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e11238__Start"/>Geneva<del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e11238__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>that town and I retired to a hiding place among the <lb n="c57-0063__main__5"/> fields that surround<del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e11251__Start"/>s<del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e11251__End"/> it, to consider in what <lb n="c57-0063__main__6"/> manner I should apply to you. I was oppressed <lb n="c57-0063__main__7"/> by fatigue and hunger and far too unhappy to <lb n="c57-0063__main__8"/> enjoy the gentl<del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e11261__Start"/>l<del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e11261__End"/>e breezes of evening or the prospect <lb n="c57-0063__main__9"/> of the sun setting behind the stupendous moun<lb n="c57-0063__main__10"/>tains of the Jura. At this time <del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e11273__Start"/>I was relieved by<del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e11273__End"/><lb n="c57-0063__main__11"/> a slight sleep <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>relieved me which was disturbed by the <lb n="c57-0063__main__12"/> approach of a beautiful child who came <lb n="c57-0063__main__13"/> running into the recess I had chosen with <lb n="c57-0063__main__14"/> all the sportiveness of infancy—Suddenly as I <lb n="c57-0063__main__15"/> gaze<mdel>n</mdel>d on him an<del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e11312__Start"/>thought<del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e11312__End"/>idea seized me – that <lb n="c57-0063__main__16"/> this little creature was <del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e11321__Start"/>uncorrupted &<del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e11321__End"/>unpre<lb n="c57-0063__main__17"/>judiced& ha<mdel>v</mdel>d<mdel>e</mdel> lived too short a time to have <lb n="c57-0063__main__18"/> imbibed <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>a horro<mdel>w</mdel>r of deformity. If therefore I <lb n="c57-0063__main__19"/> could seize him & educate him as my <lb n="c57-0063__main__20"/> companion & friend, I should not be so <lb n="c57-0063__main__21"/> desolate <mdel>o</mdel>in this peopled earth. <del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e11384__Start"/>Un<del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e11384__End"/> Urged by this <lb n="c57-0063__main__22"/> impulse I seized on the boy as he passed <lb n="c57-0063__main__23"/> and drew him towards me. As soon as he beheld <lb n="c57-0063__main__24"/> my form he placed his hand before his eyes <lb n="c57-0063__main__25"/>& uttered a shrill scream. I drew his hand <lb n="c57-0063__main__26"/> forcibly from his <del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e11400__Start"/>eyes<del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e11400__End"/>face& said Child, w<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>hat is <lb n="c57-0063__main__27"/> the meaning of this? I do not intend to hurt <lb n="c57-0063__main__28"/> you— listen to me. He struggled violently <lb n="c57-0063__main__29"/> Let me g<del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e11424__Start"/>r<del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e11424__End"/>o<del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e11427__Start"/>w<del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e11427__End"/> he cried— Monster — ugly wretch <lb n="c57-0063__main__30"/> You wish to eat me & tear me to pieces you <lb n="c57-0063__main__31"/> are an ogre, – let me go or I will tell my papa. <lb n="c57-0063__main__32"/> Boy said I – You will never see your father <lb n="c57-0063__main__33"/> again –you must come with me. He <lb n="c57-0063__main__34"/> burst into loud cries — hideous monster <lb n="c57-0063__main__35"/> let me go — My papa is a syndic he is <lb n="c57-0063__main__36"/> M. Frankenstien let me go you dare not <lb n="c57-0063__main__37"/> keep me<mdel>!</mdel>. Frankenstein cried I — You belong then <lb n="c57-0063__main__38"/> to my enemy–To <del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e11459__Start"/>wh<del loc="c57-0063__main__d1e11459__End"/> him towards whom I have<lb n="c57-0064__main__1"/> sworn eternal revenge & you shall be <lb n="c57-0064__main__2"/> my first victim. The child still struggled <lb n="c57-0064__main__3"/>& loaded me with<del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11473__Start"/>e<del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11473__End"/> epithets which carried <lb n="c57-0064__main__4"/> despair to my heart – I grasped his t<mdel>r</mdel>hroat <lb n="c57-0064__main__5"/> to silence him & in a moment he lay <lb n="c57-0064__main__6"/> dead at my feet.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0064__main__7"/> I gazed on my victim and my heart <lb n="c57-0064__main__8"/> swelled with exultation and hellish <lb n="c57-0064__main__9"/> triumph — <del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11501__Start"/>I<del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11501__End"/> clapp<mdel>ed</mdel>ing my hands <del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11513__Start"/>&<del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11513__End"/> I exclaimed <lb n="c57-0064__main__10"/> I <del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11520__Start"/>too<del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11520__End"/>too can <del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11530__Start"/>destroy<del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11530__End"/>make desolate. – My enemy is not impreg<lb n="c57-0064__main__11"/>nable; this death will carry despair to <lb n="c57-0064__main__12"/> him & a thousand thousand others <metamark>^</metamark>miseries<lb n="c57-0064__main__13"/><del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11557__Start"/>will d<del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11557__End"/> shall torment & destroy him. <lb n="c57-0064__main__14"/> As I fixed my eyes on the child I saw <lb n="c57-0064__main__15"/><lb n="c57-0064__left_margin__1"/>something glittering on his breast – I took it <lb n="c57-0064__main__16"/> I was the portrai<mdel>d</mdel>t of a most lovely woman. <lb n="c57-0064__main__17"/> In spite of my malignity <del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11587__Start"/>and horro<del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11587__End"/> it <lb n="c57-0064__main__18"/> softened and attracted me. for a few <lb n="c57-0064__main__19"/> moments I gazed with delight on her <lb n="c57-0064__main__20"/> dark <del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11599__Start"/>black<del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11599__End"/>deep eyes & lovely lips but <lb n="c57-0064__main__21"/> presently my rage returned: I remembered <lb n="c57-0064__main__22"/> that I was for ever deprived of the <lb n="c57-0064__main__23"/> delights such <del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11612__Start"/>ba<del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11612__End"/> beautiful creatures <lb n="c57-0064__main__24"/> could bestow – and that <del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11619__Start"/>the cont<del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11619__End"/> she whose <lb n="c57-0064__main__25"/> resemblance I contemplated <del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11625__Start"/>wh<del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11625__End"/> would, <lb n="c57-0064__main__26"/><del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11629__Start"/>have<del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11629__End"/><del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11633__Start"/>ch<del loc="c57-0064__main__d1e11633__End"/> in regarding me have, changed <lb n="c57-0064__main__27"/> that air of divine benignity to one of <lb n="c57-0064__main__28"/> horror & detestation.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0064__main__29"/> Can you wonder that such <lb n="c57-0064__main__30"/> thoughts transported me with rage? <lb n="c57-0064__main__31"/> I only wonder that at that moment <lb n="c57-0064__main__32"/> instead of venting my sensations in <lb n="c57-0064__main__33"/> useless exclamations & agony I did not <lb n="c57-0064__main__34"/> rush among mankind and perish <lb n="c57-0064__main__35"/> in the attempt to destroy them.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0065__main__1"/> While I <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>was overcome by these feelings I <lb n="c57-0065__main__2"/> left the spot where I had committed the <lb n="c57-0065__main__3"/> murder and sought a more secluded <lb n="c57-0065__main__4"/> hid<mdel>ed</mdel>ing place. At that moment I peceiv<lb n="c57-0065__main__5"/>ing a woman passing near me,– she <lb n="c57-0065__main__6"/> was young; not indeed so beautiful as <lb n="c57-0065__main__7"/> her who portrait I held but of an <lb n="c57-0065__main__8"/> agreable <del loc="c57-0065__main__d1e11708__Start"/>in<del loc="c57-0065__main__d1e11708__End"/> aspect & blooming in the <lb n="c57-0065__main__9"/> loveliness of health & youth. And here <lb n="c57-0065__main__10"/> I thought is one <del loc="c57-0065__main__d1e11715__Start"/>one<del loc="c57-0065__main__d1e11715__End"/> of those whose <lb n="c57-0065__main__11"/> smiles are bestowed on all but me <lb n="c57-0065__main__12"/><del loc="c57-0065__main__d1e11722__Start"/>but<del loc="c57-0065__main__d1e11722__End"/> She shall not escape my vengeance <lb n="c57-0065__main__13"/> thanks to the lessons of Felix & the <lb n="c57-0065__main__14"/> sanguinary laws of man, I <del loc="c57-0065__main__d1e11735__Start"/>know<del loc="c57-0065__main__d1e11735__End"/>have learned how <lb n="c57-0065__main__15"/> to work mischief. I approached her <lb n="c57-0065__main__16"/> unpeceived, and placed the portrait <lb n="c57-0065__main__17"/> securely in one of the folds of her <lb n="c57-0065__main__18"/> dress.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0065__main__19"/> For some day I haunted the spot <lb n="c57-0065__main__20"/> where these scenes had taken place <lb n="c57-0065__main__21"/> sometimes wishing to see you some<lb n="c57-0065__main__22"/>times resolved to quit the world & it <lb n="c57-0065__main__23"/> miseries for ever. <del loc="c57-0065__main__d1e11770__Start"/>I have<del loc="c57-0065__main__d1e11770__End"/>At length I wandered <lb n="c57-0065__main__24"/><mdel>to</mdel><lb n="c57-0065__left_margin__1"/>towards these mountains and have ranged <lb n="c57-0065__main__25"/><mdel>in</mdel><lb n="c57-0065__left_margin__1"/>through their immense recesses consumed <lb n="c57-0065__main__26"/> by a burning passion which you <lb n="c57-0065__main__27"/> alone can gratify—And we may not <lb n="c57-0065__main__28"/> part untill you have promised <lb n="c57-0065__main__29"/> to <mdel>s</mdel>comply with my requisitions. I am <lb n="c57-0065__main__30"/> alone & miserable. Man will not <lb n="c57-0065__main__31"/> associate with but one as deformed <lb n="c57-0065__main__32"/> and horrible as my self would not <lb n="c57-0065__main__33"/> deny herself to me. This being you <lb n="c57-0065__main__34"/> must create.<del loc="c57-0065__main__d1e11839__Start"/>for me.<del loc="c57-0065__main__d1e11839__End"/>
